verbs.description: [ARG0: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [V: called] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: “ insulting and unacceptable ” for President Trump to slap steel and aluminum tariffs on the United States’ neighbor to the north] .

Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau called it “ insulting and unacceptable ” for [ARG0: President Trump] to [V: slap] [ARG1: steel and aluminum tariffs] [ARG2: on the United States’ neighbor to the north] .
